name: Aléatoire (zanglucarson, DuplexSlash, aeon)
description:
Hailing from Castirona, Joshua Protagonist  leaves on an adventure (as you do).

Along this quest, he comes across a man named Grov Grovular. Grov meets a terrible fate after falling into a well, he is struck with the curse of the Aléatoire. This curse allows him to manipulate reality to his will. Now everything is Out of Control! Can Josh rescue Grov and save the day?

"Better than Mario! (as an IP)."
-Zang Lucarson

"Even Gino endorses the thing!"
-Double Slash


Programming, Level Design: Aeon

Story: Zang, Aeon, Double Slash

Spritework: Double Slash, Zang

Soundtrack: Double Slash

Dialogue: Aeon
